transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Hi, yeah, I'm naming.
Speaker A: Hi Namin, how are you?
Speaker B: I'm fine, thank you.
Speaker A: This is Hussain. I'm calling from UCL accommodation portal powered by Amber. I was trying to connect your accommodation. Okay, yeah. Could you please confirm you are still looking for accommodation?
Speaker B: Yeah.
Speaker A: All right. Can we now discuss about your accommodation? Do you have some time in your hand?
Speaker B: Sorry, I can't catch you. Can you repeat it?
Speaker A: I was saying like, is it the right time to discuss about your accommodation? Are you free now?
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah, yeah, of course.
Speaker A: Perfect. So Norman, I was trying to connect with you and I texted you over WhatsApp. Also please share what kind of accommodation you're looking for right now.
Speaker B: Okay, so sorry, are you calling from the UCL official department or not?
Speaker A: Yes.
Speaker B: Okay. I'm. You know, I will study in the A. Great Ormond. Un. Great Ormond child healthcare center. So I would like to near the. I would like to say the nearest hospital.
Speaker A: Okay.
Speaker B: And is it possible I'm looking for the in suite accommodation.
Speaker A: You are looking for ensuite?
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah. Institute with the private bathroom. Yeah, with private room and private bathroom.
Speaker A: Sure. And a shared kitchen. Right, yeah. Could you let me know what is the desired budget you have?
Speaker B: Okay, my maximum budget is. Is 300. Sorry, 310 pounds per week. It's the maximum.
Speaker A: 310 pounds per week, right?
Speaker B: Yeah. Three one, zero.
Speaker A: All right, just allow me a moment, let me check what would be the best one for you and do you have any other preferences Apart from the ensuite? Do you have any other preferences? Anything at all? No, no.
Speaker B: Thank you. But you know my budget is very tight so if it's not. Yeah, if it's not, how can they match with my budget? I can choose the. I can choose the shared bathroom and shared kitchen. Only private room.
Speaker A: Yeah, that is what I was trying to advise you for. I have few accommodation which comes under your budget, but very few. Only one or two accommodations are there that will give you private bathroom in that budget. I want to know one more thing, if you don't mind. Do you have. You are international student, right?
Speaker B: Yeah, I'm the international student.
Speaker A: Perfect. So do you have a UK based guarantor? Someone staying in UK who will be your guarantor? Do you have someone like that?
Speaker B: Sorry, I can't understand what you're asking, but I already. My visa.
Speaker A: No, not about visa, this is a different thing. Let me explain it to you. So basically to book prop. Book an accommodation here, students need a UK based guarantee. That means someone who is staying In UK earnings.
Speaker B: I haven't any graduation but I. I have been awarded the churning scholarship. So chevening provided me my living cost.
Speaker A: No, it's not that. I'm talking about a different thing. Okay. I was asking you, do you have any family members? Do you have any relatives or any friends in UK can be your parent? Okay. So I have to provide you accommodations that doesn't require UK based character. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay. Thank you.
Speaker A: I have an accommodation. It is called Mannequin House and it. The rent is three under 310. Okay. I'm sharing you that one. And I'm sharing two IQ properties. IQD Arcade and IQ spelling code. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker A: I will be sharing this in your WhatsApp. Can you please connect. Confirm your WhatsApp number once?
Speaker B: Okay, so my WhatsApp number is my mobile number.
Speaker A: The same number as this one?
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah, yeah.
Speaker A: All right. All right. I will be sharing you the properties on your WhatsApp. Please check them out and please let me know on WhatsApp. And, and please understand like as September intake is about to be over, we are running very low on accommodations. So do check them out and let me know. Okay?
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker A: All right, take care.
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: Okay, go ahead, tell me. No, no, it's okay. Go ahead, ask me the question you were about to ask. Okay.
Speaker B: So you know, if it's possible, you can send me the email. Is it okay?
Speaker A: Yeah, I can send you the email. Yeah, I'll share on WhatsApp. Then I'll share on email also. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay, thank you. Thank you. Okay, all done?
Speaker A: Yeah, tell me.
Speaker B: For my side.
Speaker A: It's the comp.
Speaker B: All done?
Speaker A: Yes, it's done. I. I'm sharing you the properties now. Or do you want me to explain you about the property on the call?
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah, sure.
Speaker A: Just allow me a moment. Just allow me a moment. I'm sharing both of this with you and then I'm explaining about this on the call. Can I call you in a few minutes? Yeah, yeah, all right, sure. All right. No man, I will be calling in a few minutes. Take care. Bye. Bye.
